name: Lysandra Shadowcloak
appearance: Lysandra is a tall, slender woman with long, raven-black hair that falls in intricate patterns over her shoulders. She wears dark robes adorned with arcane symbols and carries an obsidian staff with a crystal orb at the tip.

stunts.name: Arcane Reflexes
stunts.description: You can dodge or parry attacks with a rolled dice, reducing damage taken.

stunts.name: Shadowy Presence
stunts.description: Your presence strikes fear into enemies, granting advantage on intimidation rolls.

stunts.name: Spellweave Mastery
stunts.description: You can use your Arcana skill to enhance or modify spells from other skills.

quirks: Constantly muttering incantations under her breath
fears: Being hunted by those seeking power for evil purposes
Straying further from the light of magic
desires: Understanding the true nature of magic
Helping those oppressed by dark forces

backstory.origin: Lysandra was born into a prestigious lineage of mages, known for their mastery over the arcane arts.
backstory.formativeEvent: After a failed ritual left her marked as an outcast and nearly cost her life, she fled to roam the Shattered Realms in search of redemption and knowledge beyond her order's teachings.
backstory.secret: She carries a relic from her past - a shard of an ancient spell that holds untold power but also whispers warnings of its dark consequences.
backstory.summary: Once a revered mage, Lysandra now wanders the land, using her skills to aid those in need and uncover the truth behind the corruption that tainted her people.

phrases: In the name of the Old Ones
quirks: Speaks in a measured cadence, punctuating her words with mystical syllables
